ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( pse__Date__c > pse__Schedule__r.pse__End_Date__c, pse__Date__c < pse__Schedule__r.pse__Start_Date__c, pse__End_Date__c > pse__Schedule__r.pse__End_Date__c, pse__End_Date__c < pse__Schedule__r.pse__Start_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Start and/or End Date does not fall within the start and end dates of the schedule.
